about_the_game:
• The game combines the romantic feelings of the martial arts world with the relaxed fun of playing games. In the game, players will play as a novice martial arts hero, gradually growing from a small newcomer to a legendary figure of the martial arts alliance leader.

    The game is set against the backdrop of ancient rivers and lakes, with beautiful and delicate graphics that recreate the ever-changing scenes of the rivers and lakes. Players can experience rich gameplay in the game, such as freely exploring the rivers and lakes, making friends with various heroes and heroes, and challenging various martial arts masters. At the same time, the game also incorporates placement gameplay, allowing players to easily enjoy the fun of the game while feeling the fierce competition and charm of unparalleled martial arts in the martial arts world.

  • In the game, players can recruit various heroes, cultivate their martial arts skills, form their own martial arts sects, and collect resources and create divine weapons through gameplay placement, ultimately becoming the leader of the martial arts alliance to unify the Jianghu. At the same time, the game also features rich plot tasks and activities, allowing players to experience different martial arts storylines and feel the passion of the martial arts world.

  • Whether you are a fan of martial arts culture or a player who enjoys playing idle games, it will bring you a brand new gaming experience, allowing you to fully enjoy the martial arts sentiment and idle fun in front of the screen.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.00 GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 450 or higher with 1GB Memory
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1024 MB available space
